mapper.select: SELECT PLANT_SR_AVG_NO , PLANT_NO , WH_PLANT_NO , SR_DHT_NO , SR_PR_NO , SR_WT_NO , PLANT_SR_AVG_HUMI , PLANT_SR_AVG_TEMP , PLANT_SR_AVG_WT , PLANT_SR_AVG_LIGHT , CASE WHEN MONTH(PLANT_SR_AVG_TIMESTAMP) < 6 THEN 'spring' WHEN MONTH(PLANT_SR_AVG_TIMESTAMP) > 5 AND MONTH(PLANT_SR_AVG_TIMESTAMP) < 9 THEN 'summer' WHEN MONTH(PLANT_SR_AVG_TIMESTAMP) > 8 AND MONTH(PLANT_SR_AVG_TIMESTAMP) < 12 THEN 'fall' ELSE 'winter' END AS PLANT_SR_AVG_SEASON , PLANT_SR_AVG_DAY , PLANT_SR_AVG_TIMESTAMP , PLANT_SR_AVG_CREATETIME FROM PLANT_SR_AVG ORDER BY PLANT_SR_AVG_CREATETIME DESC LIMIT #{beginPage}, #{pageSize}
